name: The Falling Seed
description:
Team Name :
Paaaaanic

Game Name:
The Falling Seed

Gameplay Instructions:
 Go down to earth using your grapple to pass obstacles while avoiding lava and ants.

- Controls -
A: Move left
D: Move right
LEFT MOUSE BUTTON: Grapple/Release
SPACE/W: Jump

What platform is your game built for?

Windows

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.
-Some textures coming from the ue4 starter pack
-Some sounds coming from Soundly
